summary: This bill, the Older Americans Act Reauthorization Act of 2025, proposes to amend and reauthorize the Older Americans Act of 1965. It focuses on several key areas, including strengthening the aging network, improving health outcomes (specifically addressing mental health, substance use, and cognitive impairments), enhancing nutrition services, supporting family caregivers, strengthening community service employment programs, and improving services for Native elders. The bill also includes provisions for a White House Conference on Aging, technical amendments, and authorizations of appropriations for various programs.
